name: RemoveTagsFromTimeEntries
description:
Remove labels from specific time entries.

Use this tool to remove labels from time entries without affecting the labels in the Workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Workspace from which to remove labels from time entries. Must be an integer.

parameters.name: time_entry_tags_payload
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the IDs of the time entries and the tags to be removed. The object should have two fields: `time_entry_ids` (an array of strings for the IDs) and `tags` (an array of objects for tags to be removed).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
